versos: (hereby) Genesis 48:16 - "...and let my name be named on them, and the name of my fathers Abraham and Isaac; and let them grow into a multitude in the midst of the earth.";;;
(candle) Job 18:6 - The light shall be dark in his tabernacle
(giveth) John 10:28 - "And I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.";;;
(house) Matthew 7:24 - "Therefore everyone who hears these words of mine and puts them into practice is like a wise man who built his house on the rock.";;;
(sounded) 2 Samuel 15:10 - "Then Absalom sent secret messengers throughout the tribes of Israel to say, 'As soon as you hear the sound of the trumpets, then say, Absalom is king in Hebron.'";;;
(market) Proverbs 31:24 - "She makes linen garments and sells them, and supplies the merchants with sashes.";;;
(contain) 2 Corinthians 6:12 - "You are not restricted by us, but you are restricted in your own affections.";;;
(gospel) Romans 1:16 - "For I am not ashamed of the gospel, because it is the power of God that brings salvation to everyone who believes: first to the Jew, then to the Gentile.";;;
(witness) Acts 1:8 - "But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you; and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the ends of the earth.";;;
(careful) Proverbs 14:15 - "The simple believes everything, but the prudent gives thought to his steps.";;;
(gladness) Psalm 45:7 - "You love righteousness and hate wickedness; therefore God, your God, has set you above your companions by anointing you with the oil of gladness.";;;
(seemed) Luke 24:11 - But they did not believe the women
(found) Luke 15:32 - But we had to celebrate and be glad, because this brother of yours was dead and is alive again; he was lost and is found.;;;
(green) Psalm 37:2 - "for like the grass they will soon wither, like green plants they will soon die away.";;;
(age) Psalm 102:27 - "But you remain the same, and your years will never end.";;;
(serve) "But as for me and my household, we will serve the Lord." - Joshua 24:15;;;
